column1: #Text=" Iroh says : " I was just out searching for a new teapot to add to my collection .
#Text=In the Spirit World , you always seem to find something you do n't know you were looking for .
#Text=" Korra says : " There 's a maniac on the loose and he 's threatening to destroy the new Air Nation .
#Text=I do n't know what to do .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Just because you are the Avatar , does n't mean you will have all the answers .
#Text=" Korra says : " I know many Avatars have needed guidance .
#Text=But I 'm the only one since Avatar Wan that ca n't get help from my past lives .
#Text=I wish I could talk to Aang .
#Text=" Iroh says : " You know , Zuko and Aang were close friends .
#Text=" Korra says : " Lord Zuko , of course .
#Text=Their relationship started off a little rocky , but they grew to become lifelong friends .
#Text=I came here looking for someone else , but I 'm glad I found you .
#Text=" Asami says : " Did you find Zaheer ?
#Text=" Korra says : " No , he was n't there .
#Text=But there 's someone I need to talk to .
#Text=Are n't you coming to the air temple with us ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " I 'm sorry , but I ca n't .
#Text=I 'm going back to the Fire Nation .
#Text=If it 's true that the Red Lotus is targeting the nations ' leaders , I need to protect my daughter .
#Text=You have to keep the Fire Lord safe .
#Text=But before you leave , I was wondering if you could help me with something .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I was often Aang 's counsel and I 'd love to be yours .
#Text=I was wondering if you knew what he might do if he were in my situation .
#Text=Rebuilding the Air Nation was Aang 's biggest dream .
#Text=He would be beside himself with joy with what you 've done .
#Text=And if he accomplished that goal , he might have sacrificed anything to protect it .
#Text=" Korra says : " So he would give himself up to save the Air Nation ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " I do n't know for sure .
#Text=The airbenders might have been closest to Aang 's heart , but , as the Avatar , he was concerned with people of all nations .
#Text=No one knew better than Aang that in times of turmoil , the world needs its Avatar the most .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Wait , you spoke with my uncle ?
#Text=We got through to the air temple .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I told you , it 's Bolin !
#Text=" Meelo says : " Bolin 's not here right now .
#Text=I 'm not looking for Bolin , I am Bolin !
#Text=Gah , look , I need you to find your dad .
#Text=" Meelo says : " He 's outside with the bison .
#Text=Did you know we found a whole herd full of baby bison ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " No , a whole herd ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Meelo , this is your commanding officer .
#Text=" Korra says : " Come on , come on !
#Text=Zaheer is on his way to the temple .
#Text=You have to get everyone out of there immediately .
